data.name: Orbital Strike VR Demo
data.detailed_description:
Enter the universe of Orbital Strike VR, a space combat simulator with 1-8 player online cooperative gameplay and immersive sci-fi storytelling. Orbital Strike VR follows in the footsteps of foundational series like Freespace and Wing Commander, but takes the genre a step further with drop-in multiplayer, an innovative flight scheme, and the ability to call in and direct awesome capital ships as close air (space!) support.



Armed with hand-jets and an array of personal weapons, experience the thrill of flying through capital ship formations and opening up a path for your fleet. A unique flight scheme prevents motion sickness while allowing movement in a free-space environment.

Free-Fly Demo


Free-Fly mode is a free-roaming scenario where you can relax, enjoy the sights, and possibly even engage a few enemy capital ships. Good luck and good hunting!

Key Features


  • Cooperative Multiplayer: Designed from the ground up for single-player and drop-in online co-op with VoIP for up to 8 players. Play solo or invite your friends!
  • Command Capital Ships: As a pilot, you are responsible for commanding and directing fleet assets. Build and deploy custom capital ships and call in strikes against specific targets.
  • Zero-G Combat: This is what VR was made for! Fly through space and alongside your fleet using hand-jet movement. A unique design prevents motion sickness while flying and seamlessly switches to teleport locomotion while within ships and stations.
  • Research Upgrades: Use your hard-fought for resources to upgrade your weapons and capital ship components in order to counter new threats that arise.

data.short_description: Orbital Strike VR is a 1-8 player co-op space combat simulator. Experience a unique combination of first-person combat using hand-jets while also deploying and directing capital ships against a relentless enemy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
